lines: gang du gnas na 'chi bas mi tshugs pa'i
sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te
bar snang la med rgya mtsho'i gting na med
ri bo rnams kyi gseb tu zhugs na'ang min
byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa
de dag 'jig rten gzhan du 'gro ba dang
de kun mkhas pas mi rtag rtogs bgyis te
chos la nges par gnas gyis spyad pa spyod
rab tu tsha zhing grang ba yi
dmyal ba nyi ma gcig bzhin dran
bkres skom dag gis rid pa yi
yi dwags rnams kyang dran par bya
rmongs pa'i sdug bsngal rab mang ba'i
dud 'gro blta zhing dran par bya
sdug bsngal med par yid 'byung min
de bas sems khyod brtan par mnos
gzhan yang sdug bsngal yon tan ni
skyo bas dregs pa sel bar byid
bde ba kun gyi nang na sred zad pa
bde ba'i bdag por bgyid pa ji lta bar
de bzhin sdug bsngal kun gyi nang na ni
mnar med dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rab mi bzad
'di na nyin gcig mdung thung sum brgya yis
rab tu drag btab sdug bsngal gang lags pa
des ni dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal chung du la'ang
'ol yang mi bgyi char yang mi phod do
bstod pa brgya lnga bcu pa las
gang la nyes pa thams cad kun
gtan nas yong ye mi mnga' zhing
gang zhig la ni yon tan kun
rnam pa kun tu gnas gyur pa
gal te sems shig yod na ni
de bstod de ni bkur ba dang
de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs
zhes gsungs pa ltar nyes pa kun zad
khyod sku mtshan gyis spras gyur pa
mdzes gyur mig gi bdud rtsi ni
sprin med ston ka'i nam mkha' la
skar ma'i tshogs kyis spras pa 'dra
'di ltar sems can kun gyi nges pa'i tshig
mang pos dus gcig nyid du zhu zhus na
sems kyi skad cig gcig la thugs chud nas
gsung dbyangs gcig gis lan kyang so sor 'debs
khyod 'ba' zhig gi ye shes kyis
shes bya thams cad khyab lags kyi
khyod las gzhan pa thams cad kyi
shes bya kho na lhag pa lags
'gro ba 'di dag thams cad ni
khyad med nyon mongs rnams kyis bcing
khyod ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs rnams
sgrol mdzad yun ring thugs rjes bsngams
khyod la dang por phyag bgyi'am
'on te gang gis 'khor bar khyod
rkyen mkhyen yun ring de lta bur
bzhugs mdzad thugs rje che la bgyi
bdag ni ston pa gzhan spangs nas
bcom ldan khyod la skyabs mchis pa
de ci'i slad du zhe na khyod
skyon mi mnga' la yon tan ldan
mu stegs byed kyi gzhung lugs la
ji lta ji ltar rnam bsams pa
de lta de ltar mgon khyod la
bdag gi yid ni dad par gyur
phar phyin rjes su dran pa dang
stong pa nyid sgom pa dang
byang chub phyogs mthun sgom pa dang
pha rol tu phyin pa dang
bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi sgom pa'o
gnyis pa mchod pa'i bsam pa ni
sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam mi khyab
dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab
'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsam mi khyab
bsam mi khyab la dad rnams kyi
rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab
gang zhig nyin dad mtshan rnams su
sangs rgyas rjes su dran byed cing
gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro na
de dag mi yi rnyad pa yin
gang ngag sangs rgyas skyabs song ba
de dag ngan 'gro 'gro mi 'gyur
mi yi lus ni spangs nas su
de dag lha yi lus 'thob bo
'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi rnams ni
phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang
kun dga' dang ni mchod gnas kyi
ljon shing rnams la skyabs 'gro ste
skyabs de gtso bo ma yin zhing
skyabs de mchog tu gyur pa'ang min
skyabs de la ni brten nas su
sdug bsngal kun las mi grol lo
gang tshe gang zhig sangs rgyas dang
chos dang dge 'dun skyabs song nas
sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang
sdug bsngal ma lus 'gag pa dang
'phags lam yan lag brgyad bde ba
mya ngan 'das par 'gro 'gyur dang
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag
shes rab kyis ni lta byed pa'i
skyabs de gtso bor gyur pa ste
skyabs de mchog tu gyur pa'ang yin
skyabs de la ni brten nas ni
sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur
mi dge ba las sdug bsngal 'byung
'di las ji ltar nges thar zhes
nyi mtshan kun tu bdag gis ni
'di nyid 'ba' zhig bsam pa'i rigs
zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang
dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi
rtsa ba mos par thub pas gsungs
de yi rtsa ba drag tu ni
rnam smin sdug bsngal bsgom pas so
mchog la yid kyi sdug bsngal te
tha mal rnams la lus skyes so
sdug bsngal gnyis kyis 'jig rten 'di
nyin re nyin re 'joms par byed
lha min dag na'ang rang bzhin gyis lha yi
dpal la sdang phyir yid kyi sdug bsngal che
de dag blo dang ldan yang 'gro ba yi
sgrib pas bden pa mthong ba ma mchis so
gang phyir brtse nyid rgyal ba'i lo tog phun tshogs 'di
sa bon dang ni spel la chu 'dra yun ring du
longs spyod gnas la smin pa lta bur 'dod gyur pa
de phyir bdag gis thog mar snying rje bstod par bgyi
gnyis pa rim can du sbyang ba dngos la
gzhan don don gnyer gyi blo sbyang ba dang
byang chub don gnyer gyi blo sbyang ba dang
sbyangs pa'i 'bras bu sems skyed ngos gzung ba'o
nye du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i nang du chud gyur cing
klong gi nang du chud pa lta bur snang bzhin du
skye shi 'phos pas ngo ma shes pa de dor nas
gal te gcig thar byed na de las khrel bor med
byas pa mi gzo gang yin pa
de ni bdag gi khur chen yin
mi gang sems ni mi rgod cing
byas pa shes shing byas pa tshor
byas pa chud son mi byed pa
de dag mkhas pas rab tu bsngags
bye ba khrag khrig dkrigs pa'i 'jig rten na
mchod pa rnam mang dpag med ji snyed pa
skyes mchog rnams la nyin re rtag mchod pas
byams pa'i sems la grangs dang char mi phod
gang zhig bdag dang gzhan rnams ni
myur du bskya ba par 'dod pa des
bdag dang gzhan du brje bya ba
gsang ba'i dam pa spyad par bya
'jig rten bde ba ji snyed pa
de kun gzhan bde 'dod las byung
'jig rten sdug bsngal ji snyed pa
de kun rang bde 'dod las byung
mang du bshad lta ci zhig dgos
byis pa rang gi don byed dang
thub pa gzhan gyi don mdzad pa
'di gnyis kyi ni khyad par ltos
bdag bde gzhan gyi sdug bsngal dag
yang dag brje ba ma byas na
sangs rgyas nyid du mi 'grub cing
'khor ba na yang bde ba med
dka' las phyir bzlog mi bya ste
'di ltar goms pa'i mthu yis ni
gang gis ming thos 'jigs pa yang
de nyid med na mi dga' 'gyur
'jig rten dag na 'tshe ba gang yod dang
'jig dang sdug bsngal ji snyed yod gyur pa
de kun bdag tu 'dzin pa las gyur na
'dre chen des ko bdag la ci zhig bya
rtsigs su ma che rnams rtog spongs
rabs bdun la sogs dpe lta mang
mdza' bo'i bu mo'i gtam rgyud sogs
man ngag 'di yi gleng gzhi yin
zhes gsungs pas skyon med de
byang chub sems skyes gyur na skad cig gis
'khor ba'i btson rar bsngams pa'i nyams thag rnams
bde gshegs rnams kyi sras zhes brjod bya zhing
'jig rten lha mir bcas pa'i phyag byar
dpal byin gyis zhus pa'i mdo las
byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang
gal te de la gzugs mchis na
nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkangs te
de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur
dngos po phal pa cung zad la'ang
yid kyis sbyin par bsams byas nas
mi gang sbyin par mi byed pa
de yang yi dwags rgyur gsungs ni
bla na med pa'i bde ba la
bsam pa dag pas mgron gnyer nas
'gro ba thams cad bslus byas na
bde 'gror ci dgar 'gro 'gyur ram
sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la
byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi
bdag gis sbyin sogs bgyis pa 'di dag gis
'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog
